member.name: T:Fizzler.SelectorsCachingCompiler
member.summary: Implementation for a selectors compiler that supports caching.
member.remarks: This class is primarily targeted for developers of selection over an arbitrary document model.

member.name: M:Fizzler.SelectorsCachingCompiler.Create``1(System.Func{System.String,``0})
member.summary: Creates a caching selectors compiler on top on an existing compiler.

member.name: M:Fizzler.SelectorsCachingCompiler.Create``1(System.Func{System.String,``0},System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,``0})
member.summary: Creates a caching selectors compiler on top on an existing compiler. An addition parameter specified a dictionary to use as the cache.
member.remarks: If is null then this method uses a the implementation with an ordinally case-insensitive selectors text comparer.

member.name: T:Fizzler.IElementOps`1
member.summary: Represents a selectors implementation for an arbitrary document/node system.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.Type(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a type selector, which represents an instance of the element type in the document tree.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.Universal(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix)
member.summary: Generates a universal selector, any single element in the document tree in any namespace (including those without a namespace) if no default namespace has been specified for selectors.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.Id(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a ID selector, which represents an element instance that has an identifier that matches the identifier in the ID selector.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.Class(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a class selector, which is an alternative when representing the class attribute.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.AttributeExists(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the given attribute whatever the values of the attribute.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.AttributeExact(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the given attribute and whose value is exactly .

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.AttributeIncludes(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the given attribute and whose value is a whitespace-separated list of words, one of which is exactly .

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.AttributeDashMatch(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the given attribute , its value either being exactly or beginning with immediately followed by "-" (U+002D).

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.AttributePrefixMatch(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the attribute whose value begins with the prefix .

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.AttributeSuffixMatch(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the attribute whose value ends with the suffix .

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.AttributeSubstring(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an attribute selector that represents an element with the attribute whose value contains at least one instance of the substring .

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.FirstChild
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that is the first child of some other element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.LastChild
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that is the last child of some other element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.NthChild(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that is the N-th child of some other element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.OnlyChild
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that has a parent element and whose parent element has no other element children.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.Empty
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that has no children at all.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.Child
member.summary: Generates a combinator, which represents a childhood relationship between two elements.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.Descendant
member.summary: Generates a combinator, which represents a relationship between two elements where one element is an arbitrary descendant of some ancestor element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.Adjacent
member.summary: Generates a combinator, which represents elements that share the same parent in the document tree and where the first element immediately precedes the second element.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.GeneralSibling
member.summary: Generates a combinator, which separates two sequences of simple selectors. The elements represented by the two sequences share the same parent in the document tree and the element represented by the first sequence precedes (not necessarily immediately) the element represented by the second one.

member.name: M:Fizzler.IElementOps`1.NthLastChild(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-class selector, which represents an element that is the N-th child from bottom up of some other element.

member.name: T:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix
member.summary: Represent a type or attribute name.

member.name: F:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.None
member.summary: Represents a name from either the default or any namespace in a target document, depending on whether a default namespace is in effect or not.

member.name: F:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.Empty
member.summary: Represents an empty namespace.

member.name: F:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.Any
member.summary: Represents any namespace.

member.name: M:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes an instance with a namespace prefix specification.

member.name: M:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.

member.name: M:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.Equals(Fizzler.NamespacePrefix)
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance and another are equal.

member.name: M:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.

member.name: M:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of this instance.

member.name: M:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.Format(System.String)
member.summary: Formats this namespace together with a name.

member.name: P:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.Text
member.summary: Gets the raw text value of this instance.

member.name: P:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.IsNone
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance represents a name from either the default or any namespace in a target document, depending on whether a default namespace is in effect or not.

member.name: P:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.IsAny
P:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.IsEmpty
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance represents a name without a namespace in a target document.

member.name: P:Fizzler.NamespacePrefix.IsSpecific
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance represents a name from a specific namespace or not.

member.name: T:Fizzler.Reader`1
member.summary: Adds reading semantics to a base with the option to un-read and insert new elements while consuming the source.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Reader`1.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0})
member.summary: Initialize a new with a base object.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Reader`1.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator{`0})
member.summary: Initialize a new with a base object.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Reader`1.Unread(`0)
member.summary: Pushes back a new value that will be returned on the next read.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Reader`1.Read
member.summary: Reads and returns the next value.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Reader`1.Peek
member.summary: Peeks the next value waiting to be read.
member.exception: Thrown if there is no value waiting to be read.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Reader`1.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the remaining values to be read.

member.name: M:Fizzler.Reader`1.Close
member.summary: Disposes the enumerator used to initialize this object if that enumerator supports .

member.name: P:Fizzler.Reader`1.HasMore
member.summary: Indicates whether there is, at least, one value waiting to be read or not.

member.name: T:Fizzler.HumanReadableSelectorGenerator

member.summary: Initializes the text.

member.summary: Concludes the text.

member.name: M:Fizzler.HumanReadableSelectorGenerator.GeneralSibling
member.summary: Generates a combinator, which separates two sequences of simple selectors. The elements represented by the two sequences share the same parent in the document tree and the element represented by the first sequence precedes (not necessarily immediately) the element represented by the second one.
